settings.answer_1: No, Fashion Nova gift cards never expire and can be treated just like cash on our online store!
settings.question_2: Why did I receive a partial refund after placing my order?
settings.answer_2: One or more of your items may have sold out since your order was processed.
settings.question_3: What happens if I use a gift card to pay for all or part of my order and some items were out of stock?
settings.answer_3: The amount refunded will go back to the gift card that was used, any remaining balance will be returned to your other form of payment.

settings.faqs_text:
Fashion Nova issues refunds to the original form of payment used on an order in the event that your order:
  • Is canceled by Fashion Nova
  • One or more of your items sold out since your order was processed
  • Item(s) proved to be received damaged, defective, or incorrect
Fashion Nova will take 2-5 business days to clear your refund. Depending on your financial institution, the refund amount may take up to 10 business days to post to your account. If you used a gift card to purchase your item(s), your funds will be issued back to your gift card immediately.
